content.rendered:
Directed by R. Srinivasa Rao

Written by R. Srinivasa Rao

Star Santhanam. Preethi Verma (Savithri (Saavi)).M.S. Bhaskar. Sayaji Shinde. Vamsi Krishna. Uma Padmanabhan (Leelavathi). Swaminathan (Rajamani). Rama (Saavithri’s mother). Lollu Sabha Maaran (Thief). Prema Priya (Rajamani’s wife).Mayilsamy. Madurai Muthu (Savithri’s Uncle).Pugazh. Vaishnavi Arulmozhi (Manju (Sabhapathy’s Sister)). K. Bujji Babu (Gopal). S.R. Kothandan (Man with Suitcase)

Language Tamil

Producers C. Ramesh Kumar

Production RK Entertainment
